H0.text: Marc Dutroux hit the headlines over a 'house of horrors' in which country. France

H1.text: Marc Dutroux hit the headlines over a 'house of horrors' in which country. Netherlands

H2.text: Marc Dutroux hit the headlines over a 'house of horrors' in which country. Germany

H3.text: Marc Dutroux hit the headlines over a 'house of horrors' in which country. Beljum

A4.text: The house on the Avenue de Philippeville 128 in Marcinelle is most often cited in the media.

A5.text: The house was bought by the municipality of Lobbes in the first months of 2009.
